description:
Speaker: Holly Becker

You found some code on the internet that solves the exact problem you’re having! Great! But can you use it? What licence does it have? I’ll discuss categories of software licences, a few representative software licences, and how they interact with each other and with proprietary code.

From PyCascades 2018 in Vancouver, BC, Canada

Recorded by: Elaine at http://jollygoodrecordings.ca
title: Holly Becker Can I Use that Code? Software Licences as a User
